name: Conclave
description: An online RPG with the story and turn-based combat of a classic fantasy tabletop campaign. Play a party of up to four characters solo, or co-op with other players. Adventure together in real time, or take turns at your leisure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later with SSE2 support Memory: 512 MB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 350 MB available space
